<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;

 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;

	}

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

//下面被注释的代码是已经有章节数的前面就不加序号了
bbb = book.getVariable("custom");
sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}else{num=num}

title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	title = title + " ❖ "+intro
	}else{
		title = title
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
v=vip&&!type?' ◇':'';
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l+v;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写 [目录简介] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现
填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

2、源变量（所有书）
其余同书籍变量
填写[搜索+书名] —— 必须在第一行，搜索百合书籍，在发现里点击[百合搜索]

更改过后都要重新刷新

</js>

    java.toast("\n🌐【 " + fullUrl + " 】\n🏷️ 标签选择——" + letter);
}

try {
    if (!fullUrl.match(/closed/)) {
        var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(fullUrl));
        var authors = doc.select(".authorsbox ul:nth-of-type(2) li a");    
        for (var i = 0; i < authors.size(); i++) {
            var link = authors.get(i);
            var href = link.attr("href");       
            if (href.startsWith("http")) {
            } else if (href.startsWith('/')) {
                href = baseUrl + href;
            } else {
                href = baseUrl + '/' + href;
            }       
            push(link.text(), href, 0.25);
        }
        java.toast("\n🔍 作者数量—— " + authors.size());
    }
} catch (error) {
    java.toast("\n⚠️获取标签失败: " + error);
}

JSON.stringify(result);

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
var part1 = java.getString("h1@text");

var part2 = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[1]')).replace('作者：', '').trim();

var part3 = String(java.getString('.right@span@text')).replace(/\../, '');

var part4 = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[2]')).replace('类型：', '').trim();

var part5_raw = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[3]')).replace('字数：', '').trim();
var word = parseInt(part5_raw);
var part5;
if (word >= 10000) {
    part5 = (word / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万';
} else if (word >= 1000) {
    part5 = (word / 1000).toFixed(1) + '千';
} else {
    part5 = word + '字';
}

var part6_raw = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[4]')).replace('人气：', '').trim();
var popularity = parseInt(part6_raw);
var part6;
if (popularity >= 10000) {
    part6 = (popularity / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万';
} else if (popularity >= 1000) {
    part6 = (popularity / 1000).toFixed(1) + '千';
} else {
    part6 = popularity;
}

var part7 = java.getString('.chapter-list.0@li.0@text');

var part8 = java.getString('.bd.2@tag.div.0@text');
var result = " \n" + 
	   '⚠️ 禁传播、倒卖等；禁下小说'+ '\n'+
    '📕 书名：' + part1 + '\n' +
    '👤 作者：' + part2 + '\n' +
    '⏳ 状态：' + part3 + '\n' +
    '🔖 类型：' + part4 + '\n' +
    '✍️ 字数：' + part5 + '\n' +
    '🔥 人气：' + part6 + '\n' +
    '🕰 最新：' + part7 + '\n' +
    '📝 简介：' + part8;

result;
</js>
